name: Gandmool Dosha
desc: Gandmool Dosha is formed when the natives birth chart falls in any of 6 Nakshatras(Ashwinin, Magha, Jyeshtha, Moola & Revati) which are ruled by Mercury & Ketu. A person having Gandmool dosha is likely to suffer from or create many problems to their parents or relatives.
remedies:
Perfrom Gandmool Nakshatra Shanti Puja on 27th day after the birth of native
Worship the lord of birth start
